titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a postage stamp should be issued in honor of Samantha Smith.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 7/30/1997--Introduced. Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend and the Postmaster General to issue a postage stamp in honor of Samantha Smith.
